description: The app works perfectly on my system and has no bugs. It is good for prototyping and viewing functions as it has no way to export anything (aside from the equation itself)
It's a great, simple app for graphing. Somethings I would like to see are options to change the line thickness and options to export to image file.
summary: Great and simple. Could use a few more features

description: It is very simple app and has clear interface. Use it!
Easy to use. Slight performance issue with zoom and pan

This is one of the **best** Plotter applications out there. It has a simple UI, but don't let that fool you - it supports your use case and more, with most types of formulas being supported.

The plotter is smooth, zooms nicely and is a breeze to work with. The formula entries are great and allow you to type in complex equations with ease, and allow you to attach a color to each one.
summary: Does what it says on the tin and a lot more

description:
Very simple and clean design, very user-friendly. Nice features to understand the basics of math equations. 
To improve: the opacity of the grid. Grid can dificult the understanding of chart's paths. Also it would be good if we could change the stroke of the lines on charts.
summary: Nice basic features to graphing equations

description: Very intuitive with your help guides. I don't know if CRC Standard Math Tables is still a thing, but my copy has equations for hundreds of curves and surfaces in both trig and algebraic forms to motivate explorations of this fine aide.

I want to like it -- runs quite well, and it's useful to have an offline plotting app. But it lacks a lot of convenient and necessary features that desmos have, so I can't use it effectively. I agee with others that the grid opacity needs an option. Also, it would be nice to make the lines more clean-- I find they get blurry at the edges. There also needs to be an option to adjust axis scale. And some auto-parentheses like desmos would be nice. Overall, nice app, but I would hope to see some improvements.
summary: Almost good, but lacks critical features

description: The app is not starting and I am too lazy to debug it

Il est impossible d'ajuster l'échelle horizontale ou verticale. Celà empêche donc de visualiser une fonction où le domaine est constraint et l'image est très grande (calcul d'hypothèque sur les années par exemple)
summary: Ne peut pas ajuster l'échelle verticale ou horizontale
